game_description: Jump into your virtual park to play baseball from the comfort of your home. Play ball with your friends from across the world! Practice your swing, home runs and trick shots. Spawn infinite pitches in this virtual batting cage and take as many swings as you’d like! Derby uses custom baseball physics, making VR baseball feel more real than ever before!
review_5: This game is top notch compared to other baseball vr games. This game is easily playable for new players and i downloaded this game three weeks ago and I’ve already put a record on my distance and nobody in my family can beat it not even me, but the thing is you hit home runs so easily, I barely have to swing for a home run and i am right handed,the graphics are insane, and the game runs well but if you don’t have the best internet connection, as you lose connection to the server, you lose your bats, but overall this game is recommended to any baseball fans out there.
